name: The Thing
summary: The Thing is a 2002 third-person shooter survival horror video game developed by Computer Artworks, published by Vivendi Universal Games and Konami, and for Windows, Xbox and PlayStation 2. Game Boy Color and Game Boy Advance versions were also planned, but both were cancelled early in development. Set as a sequel to John Carpenter's 1982 film of the same name, the story focuses on Captain Blake, a member of a U.S. Special Forces team sent to the Antarctic outpost featured in the film to determine what has happened to the research team.
